page.title: 05Smarden West - Family Monday
page.content: Monday morning is chaotic, locating dinner money and missing rugby socks after the weekend, but somehow the children get to school on time. Then it's home to collect wellies & the dog, both men are away today & I have to feed the ewe lambs & check the rest of the flock, no problems there so I let our ancient pony out & see to the hens. It's now coffee time & as usual I'm starving so elevenses becomes an early lunch, then with the house quickly tidied, the washing machine loaded & a casserole in the oven it's time to get the car out again & go shopping. Maidstone is crowded with Xmas shoppers & after struggling with an overloaded trolley meet a friend for coffee before going home, collecting the children en route. The men arrive home for dinner which we all eat together at about 6.00pm.
